name: Blood Eye
description:
Blood Eye is a 2D action/puzzle game in which the player simultaneously controls numerous eyeballs to explore a vast array of hand-drawn environments, vanquish sub-conscious demons, and solve variously vexing puzzles.

*Due to the nature of simultaneous eyeball control 2 Players huddled in front of a computer (while not essential) is something I would strongly endorse (especially if this game is too challenging for 1 player.)

*Operates on Windows, given time may be released on mac also.

*4-5 hours long, with branching paths allowing for short bursts of gameplay, or longer stints for the more tenacious.

*xbox controller supported.

Any queries contact: simon.j.weber15@gmail.com
